title: the game crashed
body: after i choose the champion, and ready to go. it appear game crashed and i search everything in youtube, blog, installed the latest Directx and .net things and i still not working, i dont have any replay or anything. i have turn off my window firewall, no anti -virus program.  i dont know how to fix this now..

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
i did, and i even uninstall and installed, but still not working
